remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件時， ，或呼叫方法的成員資格提供者。The event is raised when the , , or method of a membership provider is called. 您可以處理事件，以驗證密碼格式和成員資格使用者的值。You can handle the event to validate password formats and values for membership users. 您可以取消目前， ，或藉由設定動作屬性`true`期間事件。You can cancel the current , , or action by setting the property to `true` during the event. 如果您藉由設定取消目前動作屬性`true`，您可以設定描述密碼驗證失敗之原因的例外狀況的屬性。If you cancel the current action by setting the property to `true`, you can set the property to an exception that describes the reason for the password-validation failure. 呼叫方法將會擲回例外狀況，屬性設定為。The calling method will throw the exception that the property is set to. 如果屬性是`null`，呼叫端將會擲回一般密碼驗證失敗的例外狀況。If the property is `null`, the caller will throw a generic password-validation failure exception. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範事件，它會驗證使用者的密碼格式取消動作，如果密碼不符合所需的格式。The following code example shows a event that validates the format of the password for the user and cancels the action if the password does not match the required format.
